content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), boiler (position -4.5, 24.0), and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to a power network and has no input liquid.

### Lab at position(5.5, -12.5)
Consists of a lab (position 5.5, -12.5) that is currently not powered and is researching automation.

### Stone furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of a stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) that has no ingredients to smelt.

### Stone furnace at position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of a stone furnace (position 5.0, 5.0) that has no ingredients to smelt.

### Pipe groups
Consists of multiple pipe groups at various positions, facilitating fluid transport. Notably:
- PipeGroup (position -8.5, -6.5)
- PipeGroup (position -7.5, -7.5)
- PipeGroup (position -11.5, -4.5)
- PipeGroup (position -9.5, -5.5)
- PipeGroup (position -9.5, 21.5) which is currently full of steam.

### Electricity group at position(0.5, -10.080645161290322)
Consists of multiple small electric poles surrounding the electricity generator, providing potential connections to the power network.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting electric poles to steam engine
- Ensure that there are no placement blockages when attempting to connect electric poles to the steam engine. Check the surrounding area for any entities that may obstruct the connection.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
